title: Early 2020 Top-20 hitters
text:
With the 2019 MLB regular season winding down, D.J. Short and Drew Silva unveil their early 2020 top-20 hitter rankings in fantasy leagues. They also go over some widely-available streaming starting pitchers for the weekend and early next week.

Please rate and subscribe if you enjoy what you're hearing. You can contact the show at rotoworldbaseballpod@gmail.com or on Twitter via @drewsilv or @djshort.

Editor’s Note: Stay ahead of the competition from wire to wire with rankings, customizable projections, trade evaluator, exclusive columns and more in our Season Pass . And start using optimized lineups on Yahoo!, DraftKings and FanDuel with our DFS Toolkit !
